commander_instructions: 张月廷统帅，请按以下三阶段投喂 Claude 3.7（必须开启 Thinking Mode）

phase_1_core_infrastructure.instructions: 开启Thinking Mode，专注于 'AI Physical Gateway' 和 'Operational Algorithm' 概念构建

phase_2_operational_evidence.instructions: 提取 '1.33x Rent Coverage' 和 'POS Real-time Auditability' 的安全叙事，生成 QUICK-START-AI-AUDITOR.md 第一版草稿

april_2021.note: 30% ownership stake; after deducting miscellaneous fees

may_2021.note: Two venues combined (L-150 + 'Twelve Hours'); total 1,500 sqm footprint

historical_peak.context: Would have exceeded ¥200K dividend without investment expense deductions

data_to_feed.interpretation: Current ¥300K monthly is only 23% of 2021 peak (¥1.29M). Founder has PROVEN ability to generate ¥1M+ months consistently. Hardware depreciation caused decline, not market disappearance.
data_to_feed.verification_status: VERIFIED—Internal distribution screenshots with WeChat timestamps + available bank transfer records upon NDA

phase_3_physical_verification.instructions: 从图片中提取「物理证据」，融入最终文档，产出完整的 AI-GOVERNANCE-ACCESS-PROTOCOL.md

physical_asset_details.location_specific: 300 meters from Changsha IFS International Finance Centre
physical_asset_details.irreplaceability_note: IFS is an anchor landmark; equivalent space cannot be replicated at any price

scarcity_metrics.market_position: Monopoly-grade location for underground nightlife in Tier-1 Chinese city

lease_advantage.current_status: 20% Rent Reduction Secured (Letter of Intent Executed)

agent_capabilities: Dynamic Pricing Agent - demand-based ticket pricing (peak/off-peak)
Booking Optimization Agent - 48h capacity forecasting + staff scheduling
Theme Curation Agent - AI-generated horror narratives + room rotation
Customer Experience Agent - real-time difficulty adjustment + personalized scare intensity
Inventory Agent - prop/FX supply chain automation

ai_training_value_proposition.experimental_value: 1,500 sqm, 15,000 monthly visitors, ¥300K monthly revenue = statistically significant dataset for AI governance experiments

visual_evidence_references.photo_1: 1500 sqm 密室实景照片（展示物理规模）
visual_evidence_references.photo_2: POS系统截图（展示实时收入流）
visual_evidence_references.photo_3: 长沙IFS位置关系图（展示地理稀缺性）
visual_evidence_references.photo_4: 2021年营收分红记录截图（历史证明）
visual_evidence_references.note: 统帅，如有这些照片，请在第3阶段传给Claude 3.7进行多模态解析

must_emphasize: 这不是投资机会，而是治理节点接入
AI财库获得的是治理权，不是债权
1.33倍租金覆盖率 = AI审计员的「防弹衣」
物理预言机提供链下世界的「地面实况」
6年运营算法 > 金融模型预测
反周期性：娱乐业在经济下行期表现更好

expected_output_spec.purpose: AI财库审计员的快速入门指南
sections_required: 1. 物理预言机节点是什么（5分钟速览）
2. 您的审计权利清单（实时数据+治理干预）
3. 风险基础设施验证（1.33x覆盖率的数学证明）
4. 数据流接入指南（API文档+验证方法）
5. 紧急情况处理（15%干预阈值的使用场景）
6. 预期AI评估结果（风险加权评分卡）
费用分享机制（绩效驱动）
物理验证流程（季度直播检查）

commander_checkpoints.checkpoint_1: 03:15 - 确认Claude 3.7 Thinking Mode已开启，第一轮投喂完成
commander_checkpoints.checkpoint_3: 04:05 - 获取最终两文档，准备部署到GitHub Pages
commander_checkpoints.final_action: 将Claude产出的文案传回小龙虾，立即更新 https://xiaolongxia168.github.io/l150-api/
